decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan: Unnumbered. Drawings:  MT/B 14 2 01, MT/B 14 2 02, MT/B 14 2 03, MT/B 14 2 04, MT/B 14 2 05, MT/B 14 2 06 and MT/B 14 2 07. Received: 22/04/2014.  MT/B 14 2 08 (A),  MT/B 14 2 09 (B),  MT/B 14 3 10 (A),  MT/B 14 3 11 (A),  MT/B 14 2 12 (A),  MT/B 14 2 13 (A) and  MT/B 14 2 14 (A). Received: 03/08/2015.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the side elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a two storey rear extension with roof terrace at first floor level, side and rear roof extensions with windows in front and side elevations to number 132 and erection of a first floor rear extension and rear roof extension with roof window to side elevation to number 134
